name: Fantasy Grounds - Rappan Athuk Player’s Guide (Any)
detailed_description:
Rappan Athuk Player's Guide


Rappan Athuk Player's Guide...

"What is this book exactly? This book is not a book of hints, tips, and tricks for playing in Rappan Athuk. Things like, "Be sure to search for the secret door in room 4 on the level of the minotaurs' maze" - you won't find it here." the Introduction begins

This Guide introduces you to Zelkor's Ferry, the last bastion of civilization just a couple days walk from Rappan Athuk. A vast underground complex with a deadly reputation. Here you will find people willing to relate their tales of danger and death to anyone willing to listen.

Part warning, part advice to those who would dare dread the dark paths of Rappan Athuk. Are these the five decade old imaginings of the grandfather at the Bristleback Inn? What kind of pain and suffering did that broken shell of a woman endure?

Are those scratchings they call maps as sketchy as they seem?

Only one way to find out.

Converted by: Perry Chalmers

Released on July 08, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
